News.headline: Match Preview: Gateshead FC v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Match Preview: Gateshead FC v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Gateshead FC v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League away match against Gateshead FC tomorrow
News.description:
The Daggers will be looking to bounce back following a disappointing 2-0 loss Tuesday night at the hands of Maidstone United.

Opponents Gateshead FC, currently sit 7th in the Vanarama National League following a four game win run for the Heed.

Previous 5 Results

Daggers
Daggers 1-2 Maidstone
Daggers 2-1 Bromley
Daggers 1-2 Guiseley
Southport 1-4 Daggers
Daggers 3-2 Chester
 
Gateshead
York 1-3 Gateshead
Gateshead 3-1 Forest Green
Chester 1-2 Gateshead
Gateshead 3-0 Southport
Torquay 3-1 Gateshead

Team News
Corey Whitely serves his third of a three match ban suspension . Matt Robinson, Luke Howell, Luke Pennell and Curtley Williams are still not available for the Daggers.
 
Previous Meetings
The Daggers had a day to forget the last time the two teams met. Gateshead beat the Daggers 5-0 with four second half goals.

Fixtures
There are eleven games taking place in the Vanarama National League this Saturday with one game taking place Friday night. 3pm KO unless stated.

Chester V Tranmere (Friday, 7:45 KO)
Aldershot V Lincoln City
Barrow V Sutton
Boreham Wood V Bromley
Braintree V Wrexham
Dover V Solihull
Forest Green V Macclesfield
Gateshead V Daggers
Maidstone V Southport
North Ferriby V Woking
Torquay V Guiseley
York V Eastleigh

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.

An away guide for the game can be found here.

Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.
